ClipboardItemGetType.summary: The getType() method of the interface returns a {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a of the requested {{Glossary("MIME type")}} or an error if the MIME type is not found.

remarks.para:
-Clipboard API
-Async Clipboard API demo on Glitch
-Image support for Async Clipboard article

ClipboardItemGetType.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} that resolves with a object.
